articles.author: Patrick Marley, Yvonne Wingett Sanchez, Joel Achenbach, Molly Hennessy-Fiske
articles.title: Early voting turnout high as almost 44% of 2020 electorate cast ballots - The Washington Post
articles.description: As millions of Americans cast their ballots early, Election Day has morphed into Election Season.
articles.content: To a striking extent, Americans are not waiting for Election Day to vote. More than 69 million people had already cast their ballots as of Friday, which is nearly 44 percent the total number cast in … [+10498 chars]

articles.title: Warren Buffett is sitting on over $325 billion cash as Berkshire Hathaway keeps selling Apple stock - The Associated Press
